description: {"blocks":[{"key":"62oue","text":"This protocol describes the steps of sample preparation and lysis before DNA extraction for the diatoms metabarcoding protocol of the LeeseLab. The protocol was established in the GeDNA project.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4406u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ab65m","text":"Centrifuge 50 mL falcon tubes containing the diatom samples   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6jv3i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A247E9705EA511EDB13B4D0E1E6849FE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dm87t","text":"Discard supernatant EtOH (can be poured from the falcon tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"alnc3","text":"Add   to each sample (in falcon tube). Vortex samples to elute pellets again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"D12374D05EA511EDB13B4D0E1E6849FE","id":0,"label":"fresh EtOH (96%) denatured","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aj77g","text":"Prepare each one 2 mL twist-top tube with each one spoon of 2.0 mm (ca. 10) and 1.0 mm (ca. 30) Zirconia beads. Label tubes both on the side and the lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9268b","text":"Add   to each twist-top tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bj63k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4h71p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"F683F0105EA511EDB13B4D0E1E6849FE","id":0,"label":"sample","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6bvgt","text":"Either use wide-bore tips or cut off the tips. Otherwise tips tend to clock when pipetting the sample.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66ntn","text":"Add   and   to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3gcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a120s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6llc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8h5eh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"900","error":false,"guid":"DC25A4B05EA611EDB13B4D0E1E6849FE","id":0,"label":"TNES","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"E9D66F405EA611EDB13B4D0E1E6849FE","id":0,"label":"ProtK","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"35a1n","text":"Depending on the amount of samples this can be prepared as premix. We usually prepare TNES + Proteinase K in batches for 24 samples. Proteinase K tends to self-digest if the time for samples preparation takes too long. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eavbr","text":"Prepare one sterile 50 mL Falcon tube for each sample. Label the Falcon tube with EtOH resistant labels (e.g. printed labels). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqi1m","text":"Store samples under dark conditions at   or at   until lysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6otsi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"32E154805EAB11EDB4D30318373700F3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"37E88FC05EAB11EDB4D30318373700F3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
